name: Maki Sushi
description: Traditional rolled sushi with a variety of fillings wrapped in seaweed and rice.

name: Nigiri Sushi
description: Hand-pressed sushi rice topped with a slice of fresh fish or seafood.

name: Inarizushi
description: Sweet and savory sushi rice stuffed in a fried tofu pouch.

name: Gunkan Maki
description: Battleship-style sushi with seaweed wrapped around rice and topped with various ingredients.

name: Chirashi Sushi
description: A bowl of sushi rice topped with a variety of sashimi and garnishes.
